title: Beloved Country. Unloved Hedge. (Updated) - Ep 139
itunes:title: Beloved Country. Unloved Hedge. (Updated) - Ep 139
description:
Vitaliy re-shares his 2020 musings on the US Dollar, and its role in the world, and gold, and its role in IMA portfolios.

You can read this article online here: https://contrarianedge.com/beloved-country-unloved-hedge/
